name: Overview
data: [{"id":"c139603e-f0ae-4ed7-978e-22cdf51f7114","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Simple","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3027953c-7e49-4114-9195-52c9db0f0b1c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6e1a42c-a7be-4916-baad-ee3ec9481f7f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Simple","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is a formatter that inherits from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and provides a minimal transformation of generated data. Its primary purpose is to normalize the output of a code generator by converting iterable node outputs into concrete Python lists, ensuring the result is stable and easy to consume.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"724e9545-9c5a-47b1-82cd-81416acbb387","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This formatter is intended for straightforward use cases where no additional formatting, filtering, or enrichment is required. It preserves the original structure of the generator output while making it more explicit and serialization-friendly.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f362ead6-8697-4f7b-9b3e-0f7d2c72e54d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"223f7658-be64-4c1e-baa3-851cf333df59","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"724ec47e-1e2c-435c-b4ac-1677dc0fc16d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bbea1f66-42c5-4e3d-9c83-afd5ad1d528f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method initializes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Simple","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter with a code generator instance. The provided generator is expected to expose an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"output()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method that returns the data to be formatted.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e8f48ba5-b31d-4754-9de6-71c793c4b10f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By storing the generator internally, the formatter remains decoupled from the generation logic and focuses solely on transforming output data when requested. This design keeps the formatter lightweight and reusable across different generator implementations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b31338c7-4947-4c3b-b27b-977a9db526f6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"26c2cdf8-4e60-429a-9d3d-9d3c59497b12","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3dd91292-2f9c-46b2-8710-2a3e8305d779","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"45dd40b1-542f-465e-92e0-364e73dbdf29","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method retrieves the raw output from the associated code generator and transforms it into a normalized dictionary. Each node’s output is explicitly converted into a list, ensuring that any iterables or generators are fully materialized.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b2ef1d2f-d6da-4986-8d14-b8bfdc670980","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This approach guarantees a concrete and predictable data structure that is suitable for serialization, debugging, or further downstream processing. The method returns the finalized dictionary as the formatted result.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"82e6d342-4e11-48dd-b188-c4ee83f7290b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
